LanguageData.ChattedAboutSomeone.label: charló sobre alguien
LanguageData.ChattedAboutSomeone.logrulesinitiator.ru: logentry->Chat with [other_nameShortIndef] about the other colonists.
LanguageData.Apologise.label: hacer las paces
LanguageData.MakePeace.label: hacer las paces
LanguageData.MakePeace.logrulesinitiator.rulesstrings: logentry->Tried to convince [other_nameShortIndef] to forgive a slight.
LanguageData.MakePeace.logrulesrecipient.rulesstrings: logentry->Was asked by [other_nameShortIndef] to forgive a slight.
LanguageData.SharedSecret.label: compartir un secreto
LanguageData.SharedSecret.logrulesrecipient.rulesstri: logentry->[other_nameShortIndef] shared a secret with me.
LanguageData.RevealSecret.label: revelar secreto
LanguageData.RevealSecret.logrulesrecipient.rulesstri: logentry->[other_nameShortIndef] revealed another colonist's secret to me.
LanguageData.SpreadRumours.label: difundir rumores
LanguageData.CultureClash.label: choque cultural
